overview:
Matt Johnston is the Chief Marketing Officer at uTest. In this role, Matt is responsible for the strategy and execution of uTest’s branding, advertising and community-building efforts, as well as telling the uTest story to the world through integrated marketing & PR efforts.

Before joining uTest, Matt served as VP of Marketing at OnForce. Previously, he was the Director of Marketing at Mimeo.com and a web marketing manager and commercialization strategist at Herman Miller.

He earned a Bachelor of Arts in Marketing from Calvin College, as well as an MBA in Marketing from New York University’s Stern School of Business.

More info at http://www.linkedin.com/in/matthewpjohnston or at http://www.twitter.com/matjohnston.

degrees.subject: Marketing & Technology
degrees.institution: New York University - Stern School of Business
